### Dung Beetle, Giant

![[Bestiaryimages/dung-beetle-giant.webp|cover ws-med frame right]]

_A trundling, barrel-sized beetle with a T-shaped horn._

**LV** 2, **AL** N

**ATK** 1 horn +1 (1d4 + knock)

**Knock:** DC 9 STR or pushed a close distance and fall down.
